name: Mabon yn y rhithwir
description:
Welsh is the ancient indigenous language of Britain that is still alive and well, and spoken by more that 500,000 people in Wales. The Mabinogion are the oldest recorded folktales from the British Isles. In this game you are transported to the world of the Mabinogion where you must follow the quest for Mabon. 

The game is fully immersive; there is no English or language other than Welsh in this game. You must learn Welsh from the ground up! 

Good luck! 

-download the zip and run the Unity executable to play.  (currently windows & HTC Vive only)
